item.title: Ravinia Festival 的计划
item.description: 已经买了下面场次的票： Emerson String Quartet (Tue 6/28/2022 7:30 PM) CSO x Marin Alsop/Stewart Goodyear (Fri 7/15/2022 8:00 PM) CSO x Marin Alsop/Marcus Roberts (Sat 7/16/2022 7:30 PM) CSO: Tchaikovsky Spectacular (Sun 8/21/2022 5:00 PM)
item.content:encoded:
已经买了下面场次的票：

  • Emerson String Quartet (Tue 6/28/2022 7:30 PM)
  • CSO x Marin Alsop/Stewart Goodyear (Fri 7/15/2022 8:00 PM)
  • CSO x Marin Alsop/Marcus Roberts (Sat 7/16/2022 7:30 PM)
  • CSO: Tchaikovsky Spectacular (Sun 8/21/2022 5:00 PM)
